TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyInfo extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 XML 数字签名或 XML 加密 元素。

span.span: Represents an XML digital signature or XML encryption element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示在 XML 数字签名和加密的密钥信息。The class represents key information in XML digital signing and encryption. 类，可以嵌入专门用于帮助标识验证或解密 XML 文档所必需的密钥的密钥相关的信息。The class enables you to imbed key-related information intended to help identify the key necessary for validating or decrypting the XML document. 多个类型的密钥相关的信息可能会包含在单个; 每种类型的密钥相关信息具有关联的类派生自。Multiple types of key-related information can be included within a single ; each type of key-related information has an associated class derived from . 有关详细信息``元素，请参阅 XMLDSIG 规范，这是可从在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ W3C，或请参阅 XML 加密规范，这是可从在 www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/ W3C。For more information about the `` element, see the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/, or see the XML encryption specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用对象时签名由统一资源标识符 (URI) 表示的资源。The following code example uses the object when signing a resource represented by a Universal Resource Identifier (URI). 此示例将保存在新的文件的签名。This example saves the signature in a new file. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CPP/xmldsigdetach.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CS/xmldsigdetach.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/VB/xmldsigdetach.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例使用对象时签名 XML 文档。The following code example uses the object when signing an XML document. 此示例将保存在新的文件的签名。This example saves the signature in a new file. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CPP/xmldsigenv.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CS/xmldsigenv.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/VB/xmldsigenv.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例使用对象加密 XML 文档时。The following code example uses the object when encrypting an XML document. 此示例将嵌入到加密的 XML 文档中的加密的密钥。This example embeds an encrypted key within the encrypted XML document. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例使用对象加密 XML 文档时。The following code example uses the object when encrypting an XML document. 此示例将一个名称映射到对称密钥来解密方法标识它。This example maps a name to a symmetric key to identify it to the decryption method. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/CPP/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/VB/sample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

summary.span: 返回 对象中 对象的枚举器。

span.span: Returns an enumerator of the objects in the object.

returns.span: 可用于循环访问集合的 的子元素的枚举器。

span.span: An enumerator of the subelements of that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在同一时间同一集合中获取的两个枚举器一定不要求返回相同的迭代。Two enumerators taken from the same collection at the same time are not necessarily required to return the same iteration. 最初，枚举器必须定位在集合的第一个元素之前，必须高级的由调用方在使用之前的实现。Initially, the enumerator must be positioned before the first element of the collection and must be advanced by the caller of the implementation before use.
